item.title: Rune Legacy
item.dc:creator: @Kono-chan Kono-chan
item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

[quote=“xGenesis R, post:16, topic:425809”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=528470.msg3854220#msg3854220 date=1324240101]

Lol. I actually I have been banned from r-s once, I am perm IP’d on free coding, and yeah lol.
But I am playing rune legacy right now lol, just seeing how the server is, its popular, stable too, 93 players, no lag. I could see this project going great, gl!
[/quote]its very likely it’s stable with no lag due to such a large vps, possibly even a dedi…especially with 93 players.

No dedi, just a small vps lol. We need a dedi though if you’re offering D:[/quote]

Small VPS? With your VPS we could hold 1,500+ people. O.o Got extra monies, because we’ll sure take it off your hands. <3

Read full topic
